1. Payment Gateway - Razorpay

All payments are securely processed using Razorpay. We do not store any credit/debit card or net banking details on our servers. Razorpay handles the entire transaction process on our behalf.

  • Payment confirmation will be provided after successful transaction.

2. Return Policy (5–7 Days)

We offer a return window of 5 to 7 days from the date of delivery. Returns are accepted under the following conditions:

  • Proof of purchase/invoice is required.

After inspection, refunds will be processed within 5–10 business days.

3. Seller Responsibilities

4. Dispute Resolution
